attributes.action: pay grandparents money for childcare while parents can go back to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Grandparents should be intitled to get money to look after their grandchildren, because it puts a lot of people off returning to work after having a baby because they do not want strangers to look after their child, I think that it would encourage a lot of people in to work and cost the government less money then paying the childcare  providers, some grandparents would love to look after their grandchildren but they can not due to money that is needed to feed a child or take them out on day trips.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
